description: Detects the malicious use of a control panel item
author: Kyaw Min Thein
Furkan Caliskan (@caliskanfurkan_)
name: Control Panel Items
query: (event.category:process AND (((((process.executable:/.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:/[Rr][Ee][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND (process.command_line.text:"*add*" AND process.command_line:/.*[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\ [Pp][Aa][Nn][Ee][Ll]\\[Cc][Pp][Ll][Ss].*/))) OR ((process.command_line:/.*\.[Cc][Pp][Ll]/ AND (NOT ((process.command_line:(/.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\.*/ OR /.*\%[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\%.*/ OR /.*\|[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\|.*/)) OR (process.command_line:/.*[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]32\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Ss]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ii][Gg][Ff][Xx][Cc][Pp][Ll]\.[Cc][Pp][Ll].*/)))))))
